meanings.definition: Prehumans: beings that existed before modern humans
meanings.sent1: Scientists study prehumans to learn about our ancient ancestors.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed fossils of prehumans found in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The children dressed up as prehumans for the history play.
meanings.sent4: In the documentary, they explored the daily lives of prehumans.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of a new prehuman species excited the archaeological community.

meanings.definition: Prehumans: relating to or characteristic of beings that existed before modern humans
meanings.sent1: The ancient tools were identified as prehuman artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The cave paintings provided insight into prehuman culture.
meanings.sent3: The prehuman diet consisted mainly of fruits and nuts.
meanings.sent4: The scientist made a prehuman comparison to explain the behavior.
meanings.sent5: The prehuman footprints were preserved in the hardened mud.

meanings.definition: Prehumans: the study of beings that existed before modern humans
meanings.sent1: Anthropologists specialize in prehumans and early civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on prehumans and evolution.
meanings.sent3: The prehumans exhibit at the museum attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent4: The book delved into the mysteries of prehumans and their origins.
meanings.sent5: The documentary provided a comprehensive overview of prehumans in history.
